reviews.text: Amazing experience for my daughterâ€™s 18th birthday. The restaurant is of a good size, outstanding view of central Helsinki, the food is amazing m, and the service was impeccable. Make sure to ask for Kiia when you go, she served us really well and provided us a great experience. Drinks are also delicious!!

Great view above the city center from the 10th floor. Great service, very polite and well done. Food is good but quality/price may be better, portions are quite small and you can get hungry if you take just the main . Good selection of wine, few italians but not bad. Atmosfere is super and the terrace very nice.

We had such a bad experience here, paid more than 65eur for 3 courses menu, cocktails cost around 16eur. We expected fine dining experience, but no, see the photo of the margarita! First we got it without any salt around the rim, went to complain, got an answer that there is no salt available (?!) and eventually received a corrected one which is awful.

Good service, they get the stars. Ordered 2 steaks medium, both were too raw. Burger (26â‚¬) fries were stale and soft, and burger buns and patty were hard. Prices are extreme high for the fact that  even mcdonalds burger is better. Would not recommendâ€¦ nice view though
